page.title: 17THE WORK OF A DISTRICT NURSE
page.content: THE{DISTRICT NURSE}STARTS HER WORK BY VISITING THE ELDERLY AND THOSE WHO NEED ASSISTANCE IN BATHING AND DRESSING.FROM THERE SHE WILL GO ON TO VISIT PATIENTS WHO REQUIRE DRESSINGS CHANGED OR DIABETICS WHO MUST REGULARLY HAVE INSULIN INJECTIONS. IN THE{OATHLAW}AREA THE NURSE HAS BEEN WORKING FOR{EIGHT YEARS}HAVING STARTED IN{1977.}SHE IS A FULL TIME WORKER AND IS BASED IN THE{HEALTH CARE {CENTRE}IN{BRECHIN.} DURING{ONE}WEEK THE DISTRICT NURSE CAN MAKE UP TO{SIXTY}VISITS WHICH AVERAGES OUT AT{TEN}TO{TWELVE}VISITS PER DAY.FORTUNATELY SHE IS PROVIDED WITH A CAR BY{TAYSIDE HEALTH BOARD} WHICH ALLOWS HER TO DO HER ROUNDS EFFICIENTLY. ON THE WHOLE,THE NURSE PREFERS THIS TYPE OF WORK WHERE SHE CAN MEET PEOPLE IN THEIR OWN HOMES.
